name: Morpong
description:
OXOroots is a revisited version of tic-tac-toe and Pong.

The subject of the GameJam being Roots, the origin, we came back to the basis of the video game which is tic-tac-toe (Oxo) and pong.

Hugo Roche: Programmer
Thomas Conrie: Programme/3D artist
Théo Casimir: VFX Artist/Programmer
Lillian Duret: VFX Artist/Sound Designer/ 3D artist/Level designer
Lucas Coulombel: Game Designer/Level designer

Requirements: 2 manettes 

Inputs:
Left joystick: Control character movement
Joystick right: Control camera
RT/R2: Shoot
A/X: saut
